# Pull Request

## Summary
Explain the change and why it’s needed.

# PR title (short):

## Type
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Fix
- [ ] Docs/Chore
- [ ] CI/CD

## What & Why
Describe what changed and why.

## How to test
Steps to verify locally.

## Checklist
- [ ] Branch from develop
- [ ] Unit tests pass (./mvnw -B -ntp verify)
- [ ] CI green
- [ ] README updated if needed
